name: Escape from Area 51½
description:
Simple UFO simulator prototype that was made in Unity as part of a gamedev courses. 

Your spaceship was captured by the hostile planet's authorities and now you are inprisoned in some kind of simulation zone, a.k.a. Area 51½. Each zone has a portal that moves you through different obstacle courses, but most of the other objects in this zone are deadly to the touch.

You have to avoid these obstacles and pass through the portals to... Escape from Area 51½ (get it?)

Controls:
Move up: Spacebar
Move left / right: A / D
Toggle Lifter beam: Left shift
